example.eg: The general feeling is that he made a big mistake.
example.egtrans: 大家普遍都认为他是大错特错了。

example.eg: This is a general rule that applies to all of my employees.
example.egtrans: 这是一条适用于所有我公司员工的一般规则。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 总体的, 总的来说, 大体上

example.eg: I have a general idea what he is talking about.
example.egtrans: 我大致知道他在谈什么。

example.eg: The general told his sergeants to advance.
The general gave all the squadron leaders a pep talk.
I don't eat meat as a general rule, but I make an exception for my mother's cooking.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一般来说, 通常情况下

dsense.name: Attorney General, attorney general
dsense.guideword: US (head of US legal system) (美国)

example.eg: Eric H. Holder, Jr. was sworn in as Attorney General of the United States on February 3, 2009.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 司法部长, 检察总长, 首席检察官

dsense.name: Attorney General, attorney general
dsense.guideword: US (head of state legal system) (美国)

example.eg: Republican Pam Bondi has been re-elected as Florida's Attorney General.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 司法部长, 总检察长
特别全体大会，全体特别会议

example.eg: Dwight David Eisenhower was a four-star-general.
Scientists are in general agreement that the Big Bang took place about 17 billion years ago.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一致同意, 全体通过

example.eg: The patient will be under general anesthesia during his surgery.
You will always receive a general anesthetic before major surgery.
Contrary to general belief, penguins do not just live in extremely cold conditions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 共同信仰, 一致的信念

example.eg: We didn't vote, but there was general consent to canceling the picnic.
The Government was forced to call a general election after losing its majority in the House of Commons.
She did not understand the essay completely but she got the general idea.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 大体的想法，笼统的想法, 一般的观念，普遍的想法

example.eg: The team won the pub quiz thanks to the breadth of its general knowledge.
example.egtrans: 这支队伍因了解各方面知识而在酒吧智力竞赛中获胜。

example.eg: You will need to enter the totals in the general ledger.
The general manager of a baseball team approves all of the hiring decisions.
Most family doctors practice only general medicine.
The general post office is located in the neighborhood of Chelsea.
Everyone should see a general practitioner for regular checkups.
example.egtrans: 每个人都应去全科医生处做定期检查。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 全科医师, 普通医师

example.eg: The park is closed to the general public.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公众, 一般民众, 一般民众

example.eg: The general rule is that the bride's parents pay for the wedding.
example.egtrans: 一般来说，由新娘的父母支付婚礼费用。

dsense.name: general store
dsense.guideword: US (shop selling a variety of goods)

example.eg: Because of big shopping malls and supermarkets, it's hard to find a general store these days.
A true general strike could easily topple a government.
Einstein's general theory of relativity replaced the Newton's earlier theory of gravitation.
When is the last time you saw your GP for a physical exam?
example.egtrans: 你最后一次找自己的全科医生做体检是什么时候？

example.eg: Mrs. Winters hired a handyman to clean her gutters.
In general I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
example.egtrans: 总的来说，相较于黑巧克力而言我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一般而言, 总的说来

example.eg: In general terms, dogs need looking after more than cats.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 概括地, 大概地, 一般地说

example.eg: Hector-Louis Langevin became Canada's Superintendent-General of Indian Affairs in 1868.
The Surgeon General warns that smoking may be hazardous to your health.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 卫生局局长, 代理主教，主教总代理
